record.dc:title: 13-73 Bullock [Farm] Cave Site 8CP13, Campbell County, Tennessee. Mouth of Bullock Cave in winter.
record.wpa:narrative: One-half mile from Lindsay Mill, Campbell Co., TN. Midden deposit located along north side near entrance to a distance of 60 feet to the rear. South side washed down to bedrock by drainage water from field. Excavations made south of entrance by unknown party of men from Kentucky about ten years ago. Local inhabitants advise that several burials were found. ...
record.wpa:comments: Additional narrative and observer illustrations on file at the institution. See also photograph 13-74 [fhm01886].
